title: The developer shall allot such Affordable Housing tenaments at the rates which can extend maximum upto rates as mentioned in Regulation No
clause_text: The developer shall allot such Affordable Housing tenaments at the rates which can extend maximum upto rates as mentioned in Regulation No.3.8.2(b)(iii). (1)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
